permissions: Requires authentication and permission to update the associated job; job schedule shift create/update/delete are allowed only if the user can update the job linked to the shift.
side_effects: Deletes a job schedule shift. Deletion attempts to delete related tender job schedule shifts and will fail if related shifts cannot be deleted; it may also update job production plan records and schedule trucker shift summary post updates.
validation_notes: The <id> argument is required. --confirm is required. Deletion is blocked when the shift has cannot-delete reasons (material purchase order releases, trips, equipment-movement-only job production plan, job schedule shift splits, or schedule change notifications) or when related tender job schedule shifts cannot be deleted.
